title: AdapTable
description: AdapTable for AG Grid is a powerful extension for the market-leading AG Grid Data Grid. AdapTable extends the powerful functionality provided by AG Grid to enable you to build data management applications unparalleled in power and sophistication, with features not previously available.
ag_grid_usage: Extends AG Grid functionality and exposes additional APIs

title: Dash AG Grid
description: An AG Grid wrapper for Dash Python: a low-code framework for rapidly building data apps in Python.

title: Reflex AG Grid
description: An AG Grid wrapper for Reflex: an open-source framework for quickly building beautiful, interactive web applications in pure Python.

title: Astro UXDS
description: Astro UXDS is a collection of guidelines, patterns and components for designing space-based user interface applications which provides a custom `Astro` theme for AG Grid.

title: Streamlit AG Grid
description: Streamlit is an open-source Python framework for machine learning and data science teams. This library, from Pablo Fonseca, implements AG Grid and AG Charts into Streamlit

title: Nice GUI
description: NiceGUI is a Python UI component library which includes a wrapper for AG Grid. NiceGUI is used to write graphical user interfaces which run in the browser, so that developers can focus on writing Python code.

title: GoodData UI SDK
description: GoodData.UI is a TypeScript framework that includes a PivotTable component which is based on AG Grid. This framework is designed for building analytical applications on top of the GoodData platform, GoodData Cloud or GoodData.CN.

title: Sky UX
description: Blackbaud's open source framework provides, amongst other components, a SKY UX-themed layout for AG Grid. Sky UX leverages reusable design patterns and components to create impactful, cohesive experiences across web applications.

title: AG Grid Svelte
description: AG Grid Svelte is a Svelte wrapper for AG Grid, designed to provide a seamless AG Grid integration to any Svelte project. This wrapper exposes all grid options and is fully compatible with AG Grid, up to v30.

title: ipyaggrid
description: A wrapper for using AG Grid in Jupyter notebooks. The goal of this ipywidget is to harness the power of the excellent Javascript library ag-Grid

title: Lowdefy
description: Lowdefy is a low-code wrapper for AG Grid (and other components) which helps you build internal tools, client portals, web apps, admin panels, dashboards, web sites, and CRUD apps with YAML or JSON.

title: Hoist UX Toolkit
description: A UX toolkit consisting of open-source libraries, including AG Grid. Built on a careful integration of server and client technologies, Hoist provides an opinionated yet flexible foundation for building and operating enterprise web applications.

title: Vuestic UI
description: Vuestic UI is an OpenSource Vue 3 based UI framework that provides ready-to-use frontend components, including AG Grid, that are easily configurable and speed up development of responsive & fast-loading web interfaces.

title: Solid AG Grid
description: Solid AG Grid is a fully-featured and highly customizable JavaScript data grid. It delivers outstanding performance, has no 3rd party dependencies and integrates smoothly with Solid as Solid Component.

title: Cypress AG Grid
description: This plugin simplifies interacting with and validating against ag grid with Cypress, a testing framework for JavaScript. With Cypress, you can easily create tests for your modern web applications, debug them visually, and automatically run them in your continuous integration builds.

title: AG Grid Laravel Server Side Adapter
description: A Laravel (PHP) server-side adapter for AG Grid with support for filtering, sorting, exporting and server-side selection.

title: AG Grid Playwright
description: A simple way to test AG Grid with Playwright. Extensible enough to cover the all of AG Grid's features.

title: React GEO
description: A React component library that has wrapped AG Grid, amongst a large number of other components, to help you build modern mapping applications. It is used in combination with React, OpenLayers and Ant Design.

title: Grid Widget for BBJ
description: Based on AG Grid, Grid Widget is a Feature-rich grid component for BBj (Business Basic on Java) Based on HTML and JavaScript.

title: OpenMrs React Components
description: OpenMRS is a Medical Record System that incorporates AG Grid and is designed to simplify the development of software to support the delivery of health care in developing countries.

title: OSharp
description: OSharp is a rapid development framework based on .Net6.0 that wraps AG Grid, enabling you to use AG Grid in your .Net6.0 apps.

title: Otter
description: A modular framework for Angular that has incorporated AG Grid. The Otter project's goal is to provide a common platform to accelerate and facilitate the development of runtime customizable Angular based Web Applications

title: PortalJS
description: Leverages AG Grid, amongst other components, to help developers rapidly build rich data portals using a modern frontend framework

title: Feliz AG Grid
description: Feliz.AgGrid is an open-source package which allows you to use AG Grid inside a SAFE stack application all written in F#

title: Elm AG Grid
description: Elm integration for the Ag Grid data grid library.

title: Blazor AG Grid
description: Blazor-wrapped component for ag-Grid

title: SUI Base
description: Sui development environment and cookbook which leverages AG Grid for its data tables

title: AG Grid RS (Rust)
description: Rust bindings for the AG Grid JavaScript table library.

title: Baloise Design System
description: A design system which includes AG Grid as a reusable component and a custom style. The Baloise Design System components can be assembled together to build any number of applications.

title: SBA Angular
description: Sinequa's Angular-based Search Based Application (SBA) Framework integrates the AG Grid library to display data from Sinequa indexes in the form of a grid view.

title: AG Grid OData
description: This library creates an Odata compliant provider for AG Grid. OData (Open Data Protocol) is an ISO/IEC approved, OASIS standard that defines a set of best practices for building and consuming RESTful APIs.

title: AG Grid Symphony UX Bundle
description: This bundle implements AG Grid into Symphony UX: a JavaScript ecosystem for Symphony PHP components.
